meanings.sent1: She looked flummoxed by the tricky riddle.
meanings.sent2: The students were flummoxed by the complex math problem.
meanings.sent3: His flummoxed expression when trying to tie his shoelaces was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The maze of hallways in the old castle left visitors feeling flummoxed.
meanings.sent5: The sudden plot twist in the movie left the audience feeling flummoxed and unsure of what would happen next.

meanings.sent1: The magician's disappearing act flummoxed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The detective was flummoxed by the mysterious clues at the crime scene.
meanings.sent3: Trying to solve a Rubik's cube can often flummox even the most logical thinkers.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected question from the teacher flummoxed the student into silence.
meanings.sent5: The complex instructions on the assembly manual flummoxed the new employee, causing some delays in the project.
